articles.author: Bill Wyman
articles.title: Cherished American right behind social media ban on Donald Trump - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: You can’t force a company to provide service to a jerk. That is the simple truth behind the Facebook and Insta ban on the former president.
articles.content:
But that, sigh, is where we are. The Oversight Board posted its ruling on the web, using the sexy headline, FB-691QAMHJ: Case decision 2021-001-FB-FBR.
Talk about clickbait!

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Two American friends jailed for life after killing of Italian police officer while teenagers - Sky News
articles.description: Vice Brigadier Mario Cerciello Rega was stabbed 11 times on 26 July, 2019, after being sent to investigate an extortion attempt.

articles.title: Man Arrested In San Francisco Stabbing Of 2 Asian Women - NPR
articles.description: The two women, aged 84 and 63, were attacked while waiting at a bus stop on Tuesday, police said. It's the latest in a string of nationwide violence against Asian Americans during the pandemic.
articles.content:
Protesters held a rally in March at San Francisco's Embarcadero Plaza in solidarity with Asian Americans who have recently been the targets of hate crimes across the United States.
